index.betaMessage: Please note that this is a beta version.
index.introduction: The purpose of this application is to make your job easier when it comes to converting your docker-compose files into Kubernetes objects.
index.steps: You can convert your docker-compose files into three simple steps:
index.step3: 3. Press submit to convert your docker-compose into a Kubernetes file and get the result.

about.item2: We would like to present to you the first project that we built. It's something that we've been working on for our personal development and we hope that you will like our project as much as we do.
about.item3: Feel free to check out our Github project page and to contribute.

privacy.introTitle: Your privacy is critically important to us.
privacy.introText1: It is Com2kube's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect while operating our website. This Privacy Policy applies to https://com2kube.io (hereinafter, 'us', 'we', or 'https://com2kube.io'). We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting personally identifiable information you may provide us through the Website. We have adopted this privacy policy ('Privacy Policy') to explain what information may be collected on our Website, how we use this information, and under what circumstances we may disclose the information to third parties. This Privacy Policy applies only to information we collect through the Website and does not apply to our collection of information from other sources.
privacy.introText2: This Privacy Policy, together with the Terms and conditions posted on our Website, set forth the general rules and policies governing your use of our Website. Depending on your activities when visiting our Website, you may be required to agree to additional terms and conditions.
privacy.websiteText1: Like most website operators, Com2kube collects non-personally-identifying information of the sort that web browsers and servers typically make available, such as the browser type, language preference, referring site, and the date and time of each visitor request. Com2kube's purpose in collecting non-personally identifying information is to better understand how Com2kube's visitors use its website. From time to time, Com2kube may release non-personally-identifying information in the aggregate, e.g., by publishing a report on trends in the usage of its website.
privacy.websiteText2: Com2kube also collects potentially personally-identifying information like Internet Protocol (IP) addresses for logged in users and for users leaving comments on https://com2kube.io blog posts. Com2kube only discloses logged in user and commenter IP addresses under the same circumstances that it uses and discloses personally-identifying information as described below.
privacy.personalText1: Certain visitors to Com2kube's websites choose to interact with Com2kube in ways that require Com2kube to gather personally-identifying information. The amount and type of information that Com2kube gathers depends on the nature of the interaction. For example, we ask visitors who sign up for a blog at https://com2kube.io to provide a username and email address.
privacy.securityText1: The security of your Personal Information is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacy.advertisementsText1: Ads appearing on our website may be delivered to users by advertising partners, who may set cookies. These cookies allow the ad server to recognize your computer each time they send you an online advertisement to compile information about you or others who use your computer. This information allows ad networks to, among other things, deliver targeted advertisements that they believe will be of most interest to you. This Privacy Policy covers the use of cookies by Com2kube and does not cover the use of cookies by any advertisers.
privacy.externalSitesText1: Our Service may contain links to external sites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy and terms and conditions of every site you visit.
privacy.externalSitesText2: We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites, products or services.
privacy.statsText: Com2kube may collect statistics about the behavior of visitors to its website. Com2kube may display this information publicly or provide it to others. However, Com2kube does not disclose your personally-identifying information.
privacy.privacyText: Although most changes are likely to be minor, Com2kube may change its Privacy Policy from time to time, and in Com2kube's sole discretion. Com2kube encourages visitors to frequently check this page for any changes to its Privacy Policy. Your continued use of this site after any change in this Privacy Policy will constitute your acceptance of such change.
